headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Marriott International (MAR) Expanding Series Brand With Major India Launch
summary: Marriott International has globally debuted its new Series by Marriott brand, featuring the launch of The Fern Hotels & Resorts with 26 properties and over 1,900 rooms across key Indian destinations, expanding its portfolio as of November 2025. This move signals Marriott’s focus on regionally inspired, sustainable hospitality and reinforces its commitment to growing in vibrant international markets beyond its traditional Western footprint. We’ll examine how this large-scale India expansion...
